name: Folder
description: A Windows-style folder that can hold files, images, widgets, and other folders. Double-click to open, right-click for options. Drag and drop entities from the canvas to store them.

setColor.description: Set folder color (yellow, blue, green, red, purple, orange, pink, cyan)

addItem.description: Add item to this folder { type, name, data }

createFolder.description: Request to create a new folder widget on canvas

folderOpened.description: Emitted when folder is opened { id, name, items }

folderClosed.description: Emitted when folder is closed { id, name }

folderRenamed.description: Emitted when folder is renamed { id, oldName, newName }

itemAdded.description: Emitted when item is added to folder { folderId, item }

widgetStored.description: Emitted when a widget is dragged into the folder { folderId, widgetId }

widgetRestored.description: Emitted when double-clicking a stored widget to restore it { folderId, widgetId, widgetDefId }

documentOpened.description: Emitted when a document inside the folder is opened { folderId, document }
